name: Australian Easters
description: 3 vs 3, 8-minute speeches, no replies, no POIs

description: Four teams of two, 5-minute speeches, POIs allowed

name: Canadian Parliamentary
description: 2 vs 2, POIs allowed, PM, MO, MC 7 minutes, LO 10 minutes, PM 3 minutes

name: Canadian Parliamentary (PMRE split opp)
description: Prime Minister's Rebuttal Extension and split opposition rebuttal.  2 vs 2, POIs allowed, PM 6 minutes, LO, MC, MO 7 minutes, LO 3 minutes, PM 4 minutes

name: Canadian Parliamentary (PMRE)
description: Prime Minister's Rebuttal Extension.  2 vs 2, POIs allowed, PM 6 minutes, MO, MC 7 minutes, LO 10 minutes, PM 4 minutes

name: Canadian Parliamentary (split opp)
description: Split opposition rebuttal. 2 vs 2, POIs allowed, 7-minute constructives, 3-minute rebuttals

name: Joynt Scroll
used-at: New Zealand Universities Prepared Debating Championships

name: Middle School Public Debate Program
description: 3 vs 3, 5-minute constructives (by 1st and 2nd), 4-minute rebuttals (by 3rd), POIs allowed

name: New Zealand Easters
used-at: New Zealand Impromptu Debating Championships (Officers' Cup)
description: 2 vs 2, 7 minutes prep, 6-minute substantive speeches, 3-minute replies

name: Open Parliamentary
description: Two teams of three (7-minute speeches) plus three nonaligned speakers (3:30 speeches, 1-minute reply by teams), POIs allowed

name: Paris V
description: Two teams of five, 6-minute speeches, POIs allowed
